column2: A spill in some sports or to fall from a bicycle or while skiing or being capsized on a surfboard
The mistake of occupying an illegal position on the playing field in football soccer ice hockey field hockey
A sport in which participants must travel on skis...this one is hard
An act that violates the rules of a sport...you cant duck from this pun
The act of preventing the opposition from scoring...also important to do while programming
Several contests played successively by the same teams
